title: cultural_data_Louvre_Abu_Dhabi_–_Multimedia_Guide
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nous.ladguide.prod.
Application Name: Louvre Abu Dhabi – Multimedia Guide.
Number of Reviews: 49.00.
Application Description: Enjoy this free app before and during your visit to Louvre Abu Dhabi. Download audio-guided tours to explore masterpieces from the Louvre Abu Dhabi’s permanent collection and its rotating exhibitions, and to learn about the story of the museum and its architecture. View high-resolution images of a selection of artworks exhibited in the galleries and learn more about them with texts, audio and video. You can also create a list of your favourites for future reference and share them with others. Use the interactive map to find your way around the galleries and museum spaces with geo-tracking. App available in English, Arabic and French, with options for visitors with special needs. Additional languages will soon be available. Approximately 4 GB. of data storage capacity is required on your device for the app and its content..
Number of Characters in Description: 833.00.
Overall Rate: 2.80.
First Page Reviews: Such a non-professional developer! How could they implement a 2 5 gb download without a progress bar and notification. The app just dies when going to background Very poor. No content, slow, bad UI and UX. Abu Dhabi can do so much better... Literally useless. Cannot load anything. Please change the the language option in the app so I can choose it from within the app not based on my system language setting..
